subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Women)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: When Denise Carr-Robinson watched her daughter, Oklahoma’s Danielle Robinson, practice for the Final Four, she could not help reflecting on an era without recruiting or scholarships.
